<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Psychic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=185)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 48

You've awoken the latent abilities of your mind, taking your first steps into wielding psychic magic.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="3">Multiclass Psychic Characters</title>

Psychic is a good fit for characters who want a touch of occult power. Intelligence-based characters like [investigators](/Classes.aspx?ID=13) and [alchemists](/Classes.aspx?ID=1), as well as Charisma-based characters like [bards](/Classes.aspx?ID=3), can choose the path that best suits their inherent abilities.
